title: New: Zomby – Labyrinth
body:
[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/10/nothing_zomby-660x660.jpg)](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/11878-new-zomby-labyrinth/attachment/layout-1-2/)**Zomby**‘s move to **4AD** is starting to look fruitful after all – his album was okay, by **Zomby**‘s standards, just not consistant enough to be called an album, in my opinion. I found it to be weaker than a lot of his past stuff on **Hyperdub**, **Ramp Recordings** and **Werk Discs**. So what he’s cheekily done now is get a Japanese bonus disc that came with **_Dedication_**, and put it on wax over here in the West. The bastard.

But I’m not gonna complain after hearing this taster. The usual rave elements are there, but this time with a devilish portion of hardcore chime powering melodically through the track, like a slowed down jungle classic. The formula may be familiar but take a step back and it’s one of his most nostalgic productions yet. If this is what we’re gonna get from this new EP, entitled _**Nothing**_, then I think I’ll expect more than just nothing.

_Listen to Labyrinth below. Nothing is out on November 28th via 4AD on 12″/download._
